review:
This game is just beautiful, there is so much love in the graphics. And the gameplay works very well with the music. The playtime is not so long, I takes me round about 5 hours to play the campain, but if you want all archivements you have to play it at least 2 times.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010262453', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1482874428}
review: Beatbuddy is common puzzle game. And it's not great. But, this game's soundtrack is epic! And gameplay is mixed with this awesome ost. You can move the character to the rhythm and powerful beat comes from the behavior of character. It's all very excited experience. Although pure gameplay is not that good and playtime is very short(about 4 hours), this game's soundtrack is so terrific. Totally worth to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098942259', 'num_games_owned': 9614, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1386896989}
review:
A funky casual game with some quality music. 
You play as a small blue charactor swimming around to the beat of the music whilst following a small stroyline, you have obsticles to get by and a few puzzling situations which are not difficult to figure out, the path in which you take is also pretty obvious, but the music makes the game which is enough to keep you entertained for a couple hours or more.
Graphics are great, controls are simple enough to use aswel, overall i like it and is a good casual game to add to your collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993228578', 'num_games_owned': 521, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 357, 'last_played': 1377135412}
review: A fun ride, great music. I sort of wish the song featured in the demo was in the game (maybe it's a bonus stage I haven't unlocked yet?)

author: {'steamid': '76561197979084213', 'num_games_owned': 4492, 'num_reviews': 1009, 'playtime_forever': 354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 354, 'last_played': 1385495471}
review:
Beatbuddy... The title suggests this game is all about music and in a way it is, but don't expect something like Bit.Trip Runner, Symphony or Audiosurf here. Beatbuddy is an action adventure where your enemies produce the sounds resulting in a track for each of the six levels. The levels themselves are big and should take you around 30-45 minutes to finish. So completing the game will take you about 5-6 hours. I can tell you that that's more than enough because Beatbuddy just doesn't have enough variety to keep things interesting for much longer than that. True, it introduces new puzzles and enemies in every level that you play, like so many other games really, but for Beatbuddy is just isn't enough. 

Plus, the fact that I experienced 2 game breaking bugs made me realize that Beatbuddy is a good game, but nothing groundbreaking. I can understand that a game has bugs, as long as they don't break the game but for a game that's 2D and somewhat linear it's unforgiving. Especially if it's such a short experience.
On the other hand; the levels are well made and have beautiful art so it's not all bad.

My advice to you: grab it when it's on sale.

[Rating: 65/100]

author: {'steamid': '76561198041041540', 'num_games_owned': 849, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1697487365}
review:
Beatbuddy ist eine absolute √úberraschung eines bisher unbekannten Indie-Studios. Du steuerst eine kleine Figur, die sich zu einer Musik bewegt, die durch das Spiel generiert wird. Diese Musik wird durch die Umwelt erzeugt und bestimmt damit die Details der aktuellen Szenerie. Die Musik reich von poppig √ºber groovig bis hin zu Jazz und ist in ihren einzelnen Komponenten abh√§ngig, wie weit der Spieler von den erzeugenden Elementen entfernt ist. Dadurch ist die gesamte Spielmusik alles andere als langweilig (auch wenn ich sie alleinstehend nie h√∂ren w√ºrde), aber ingame ist sie in ihrer gesamten Wirkung nur "catchy" (das englische Wort dr√ºckt einfach besser die Bedeutung aus).
Kurz: Ein innovatives Spieldesign, welches unheimlich Spa√ü macht und sich daher einfach nur lohnt.
Noch K√ºrzer: Kaufen! Sofort!
